segments.advisor_message: So, let’s discuss some of your assets today. Could you share with me what you currently own? Any specific items you want to mention?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, I, uh, I own some stuff. There's like, uh, this classic car from, uh, like the 70s, and it's, well, kinda valued at, I think, around twenty thousand, maybe? I bought it, uh, for about fifteen thousand a while ago. And, um, it’s in good shape. Also, I have some like, ah, jewelry but I'm not sure on the value right now. Just, yeah, some family pieces. Not much else, really.
